title: 123 - Armadillo By Morning
description:
Tim ponders the meaning of song lyrics and steps in shaving cream. Livvy gossips to God and Luke explains how to cheat on your taxes. The whole gang has a heartfelt talk about armadillos and then tries to leave the zoom meeting but fails together. Plus, the great Jordan Peterson returns to give us his special Peter Pan Peanut Butter & Steak recipe!      Big thanks to Uncommon Goods for sponsoring this episode! To get 15% off your next gift, go to  uncommongoods.com/HAWKINS. Don’t miss out on this limited time offer! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
